info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 14 at 6:22PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM EDT FOR EAST CENTRAL MACOMB AND SOUTHEASTERN ST. CLAIR COUNTIES... At 621 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Marine City to near Harsens Island to near Macomb Township, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Marine City around 625 PM EDT. Algonac and Harsens Island around 630 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Anchorville, Pearl Beach, Chesterfield Township, New Haven, Adair and Fair Haven. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
